## Git

### Contribute to a git repo

1. Fork and clone locally  
Fork in GitHub  
Clone in RStudio  
Clone in terminal  
> git clone git@github.com:ltindale/leaRning-group.git

2. Create an upstream remote and sync your local copy before you branch  
> git remote add upstream git@https://github.com/mkc030/leaRning-group.git  
> git remote -v #check

3. Branch for each separate piece of work  
> git checkout -b my-first-branch

4. Do the work, write a commit message

5. Push to your origin repo

6. Create a new pull request in GitHub

7. Respond to any code review feedback
